patthana12.20:4.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca … pe …
patthana12.20:4.3: nasaraṇaṃ nanadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca … pe …
patthana12.20:4.5: nasaraṇaṃ nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca … pe …
patthana12.20:4.7: nasaraṇaṃ nanabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca … pe …
patthana12.20:4.9: nasaraṇaṃ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca … pe …
patthana12.20:4.11: nasaraṇaṃ nanadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca … pe …
patthana12.20:4.15: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana12.20:6.7: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana12.20:7.3: Hetuyā dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate dve.
patthana12.20:9.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana12.20:10.3: Hetuyā dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate dve.

patthana12.20:13.7: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.

patthana12.20:17.3: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana12.20:19.3: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana12.20:21.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nasauttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.20:22.1: Nasaraṇaṃ naanuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana12.20:23.1: Naaraṇaṃ naanuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaraṇo naanuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.20:23.2: Naaraṇaṃ naanuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.20:23.3: Naaraṇaṃ naanuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanuttaro ca naaraṇo naanuttaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana12.20:24.1: Nasaraṇaṃ naanuttarañca naaraṇaṃ naanuttarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.20:25.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana12.20:25.6: (Sabbattha vitthāro. Sahajātavārampi paccayavārampi nissayavārampi saṃsaṭṭhavārampi sampayuttavārampi pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)
